## database.Database interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Database
```

<b>Extends:</b> [FirebaseDatabase](/docs/reference/js/firebase.database.Database) from the `@firebase/database` package.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getRules()](./firebase-admin.database.database.getrules.md) | Gets the currently applied security rules as a string. The return value consists of the rules source including comments. |
|  [getRulesJSON()](./firebase-admin.database.database.getrulesjson.md) | Gets the currently applied security rules as a parsed JSON object. Any comments in the original source are stripped away. |
|  [setRules(source)](./firebase-admin.database.database.setrules.md) | Sets the specified rules on the Firebase Realtime Database instance. If the rules source is specified as a string or a Buffer, it may include comments. |
